## file.writeListUnique() function

Removes all duplicates from the list before writing it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function writeListUnique(path: string, list: readonly string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> | path to write the list file to |
|  list | <code>readonly string[]</code> |  |

`void`
